newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Bakrie to seek approval for bonus issue.
newsitem.headline: Bakrie to seek approval for bonus issue.

text.p: Indonesian conglomerate PT Bakrie & Brothers planned to seek approval at a shareholders' meeting in May for a proposed bonus issue, a company official said on Wednesday.

"The firm plans to seek approval for a planned bonus issue from its shareholders' meeting scheduled in May. But we can't give you more details now," investor relations manager Suresh Kumar told Reuters.
Kumar declined to give details, but said the firm's plan to increase its authorised capital was in line with the bonus issue plan.
Bakrie's shareholders on Wednesday approved the firm's plan to increase its authorised capital to 1.5 trillion rupiah from 968.7 billion rupiah.
